physical_appearance:Central to this coloured gelatin silver print is a piler. Around it
 there are numerous construction workers who don a safety helmet. In the background
 there are blocks of high rise apartment houses. There is a strip of yellow running across the top of the image.

sgcool_label_text:Ho Koon Sang was a member of the Photographic Society of Singapore and an Associate of the Royal Photographic Society in London. This is a very early and unique print shot on colour film.
